title: Didone, but which one?
content:
Seems to be from a foundry not featured on myfonts.com, cant find a match! Anyone?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828194646im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DeMunt_5948.jpg)
author: mike.j

comments.content:
With unique well designed fonts like this, Optimo would seem to have the chops to do just fine without listing on MyFonts. They are on my favorites list of font designers not listed at MyFonts. KLIM & Commercial Type are some others. BTW note from the prices that Optimo's products are for the carriage trade. If price is a consideration, similar fonts are the way to go.  
Don
